abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "and" : [ "Geometry POLYGON((-80 40,-70 40,-70 46,-80 46,-80 40))", "HasCoordinate is true", "HasGeospatialIssue is false", "OccurrenceStatus is Present", "TaxonKey is Pontederia cordata L.", "Year 1970-2021" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 1 records from Harvard University Herbaria: All Records 1 records from Botany Division, Yale Peabody Museum 1 records from RSA - California Botanic Garden Herbarium 1 records from University of South Carolina, A. C. Moore Herbarium 1 records from The vascular plants collection (P) at the Herbarium of the Muséum national d'Histoire Naturelle (MNHN - Paris) 1 records from University of Florida Herbarium (FLAS) 1 records from Desert Botanical Garden Herbarium 1 records from Taxon occurrence data for the FungalRoot database 1 records from Tropicos Specimen Data 2 records from Observation.org, Nature data from around the World 2 records from SBBG - Clifton Smith Herbarium, Santa Barbara Botanic Garden 3 records from UCR - University of California, Riverside Herbarium - Vascular Plants 3 records from E. C. Smith Herbarium (ACAD) 3 records from Pl@ntNet observations 4 records from Herbier Louis-Marie (QFA) - Collection de plantes vasculaires 5 records from Royal Ontario Museum Green Plant Herbarium (TRT) 5 records from University of Vermont, Pringle Herbarium 7 records from Marie-Victorin Herbarium (MT) - Plantes vasculaires 7 records from McGill University Herbarium Database 9 records from The New York Botanical Garden Herbarium (NY) 9 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Herbarium 12 records from Herbier du Québec (QUE) - Collection de plantes vasculaires 13 records from Carnegie Museum of Natural History Herbarium 48 records from CONN 53 records from Pl@ntNet automatically identified occurrences 1760 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
